Data: Johnson to Kohli, 1 run Johnson returns with a 141kph delivery, pushed towards midwicket off the back foot
Johnson to Raina, 1 wide sprays this down the leg side, nearly 144kph that
Johnson to Raina, no run back of length ball, 148.5kph, Raina was waiting on the back foot, looks to send that to the leg side but can't connect, he was looking to force that one, not just guide it
Johnson to Raina, no run a leading edge this time, no real danger though it flies in the direction of cover, lands well short
Johnson to Raina, no run looks cramped as he defends that off the back foot to the leg side
Johnson to Raina, no run there's the Johnson short ball outside off, Raina was in no position to play the hook, he wafts at it (if an attempted hook can be called a waft), no connection
Johnson to Raina, 1 run short of length ball form round the wicket, 147.8, Raina tucks this towards midwicket for a single
McKay to Raina, 1 run length ball on off stump from McKay, Raina gently pushes this towards mid-off and sets off for a well-judged single
McKay to Kohli, 1 run length ball on legstump, clipped behind square leg
McKay to Raina, no run great-looking drive off the front foot from Raina, gets a good stride in as he punches that, can't beat the diving fielder at short cover

McKay to Raina, 3 runs this time the placement is better, Raina not looking to power this one, just guides it towards sweeper cover after taking a step down the track, sends it just out of reach of point
McKay to Kohli, no run shortish and on off stump, solid defence from Kohli
McKay to Kohli, no run McKay grunts as he bowls the final ball of his sixth over, full and wide outside off, Kohli drives that towards cover but can't pierce the field
Johnson to Raina, FOUR runs pitched up and on the pads, Raina likes it there, eases this off the front foot to the midwicket boundary, well timed and this outfield is very quick
Johnson to Raina, 2 runs a touch shorter this time, on legstump from round the wicket, Raina shuffles across and tucks that off his hip towards deep backward square leg
Johnson to Raina, 1 run from over the wicket this time, Raina looks ungainly as he works this short one outside off towards deep square leg
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run length ball from round the wicket, only 132kph this time, defended towards the off side
Johnson to Raina, OUT the short ball has done the job, Raina goes for the pull but that flies off the toe end of the bat towards slip, Johnson has got the breakthrough Australia brought him back for

Johnson to Yuvraj, OUT golden duck for Yuvraj! that was 148.6 kph from Mitchell Johnson, back of a length ball just outside off, Yuvraj fishes at that one well away from his body, nicks it through to the keeper, Johnson showing again just how dangerous he is with the white ball in the subcontinent
McKay to Kohli, no run McKay bowling his seventh over here, starts with a length ball that is defended off the front foot

McKay to Kohli, 1 run shortish and wide outside off, slapped towards sweeper cover for a single, think there was two there but Dhoni sends Kohli back, Dhoni seems to be having some trouble running here
McKay to Dhoni, no run Dhoni walks down the track and tucks the ball towards midwicket
McKay to Dhoni, no run again Dhoni walks across the stumps, works the ball from outside off towards midwicket
McKay to Dhoni, no run well outside off, length ball, Dhoni shoulders arms
McKay to Dhoni, no run well outside off from McKay, Dhoni moves across towards the ball and defends it towards cover
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run bowls this 144kph from round the wicket, worked towards midwicket
Johnson to Dhoni, no run Johnson greets Dhoni with a 147kph bouncer on leg stump, Dhoni ducks under just in time
Johnson to Dhoni, no run length ball on legstump, Dhoni goes back in the crease and nudges the ball towards square leg
Johnson to Dhoni, FOUR runs short of length ball angling across, Dhoni steps forward and drives that powerfully past point for four, Dhoni is off the mark
Johnson to Dhoni, no run fuller and on off stump, slower one as well, pushed towards mid-off by Dhoni
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run quick short ball from Johnson, aimed at Dhoni's ribcage, Dhoni gets back in the crease and works the ball behind square leg
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run pitched up, Dhoni takes a couple of paces down the track and flicks it for an ambled single
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run pitched up, turns it towards midwicket, Kohli wanted to push for two, Dhoni isn't interested
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run full ball on middle from Faulkner, pushed back towards the bowler off the front foot
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run back of length ball, 130kph, just outside off, Dhoni defends it towards point
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run fuller and that is tapped towards mid-off off the front foot
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run opens the face as he guides the ball from a middle-stump line towards point
Doherty to Dhoni, no run mild lbw appeal on the first ball from Doherty, from round the wicket, Dhoni was several yards down the track, that looked to be sliding down
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run drives it inside-out towards deep extra cover for a single
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run shuffles towards leg and drives that towards long-off for one more
Doherty to Dhoni, no run pushed back towards the bowler
Doherty to Dhoni, no run length ball on middle and off, not much turn here for Doherty, more defence to the off side
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run fuller and on off stump, driven towards long-off for the third single of the over
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run goes deep in the crease and guides that behind point for a single
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run full and outside off, crisply driven towards cover
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run outside off and that is left alone
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run short of length ball on middle and off, pushes it towards point, Dhoni nearly slips again as he is sent back when attempting a single
Faulkner to Dhoni, 2 runs length ball on the pads, whipped towards for a quick couple
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run fuller and outside off, eased towards extra cover
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run on the pads, Dhoni takes several paces down the track and eases the ball towards long-on, easy single
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run dropped, that was a very thick edge though and Haddin hasn't enough time to react, strikes his right pad , good delivery from Doherty that spins just a bit
Doherty to Dhoni, no run
Doherty to Dhoni, no run works it to the right of the bowler
Doherty to Dhoni, no run pushed back towards the bowler
Doherty to Dhoni, no run opens the face as he drives that towards extra cover, end of a good over from Doherty
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run back of length ball on off stump, guided off the back foot towards third man
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run pushes this towards extra cover for a single
Faulkner to Kohli, no run back of a length once more, waits in the crease for that legstump delivery, plays it to the off side
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run short ball and that is firmly pulled away towards deep square leg, well in control as he played that, taking care to keep the ball on the ground
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run defended towards midwicket by Dhoni
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run short of length ball on off stump, Dhoni stays in the crease and pushes that towards sweeper cover
Doherty to Dhoni, no run steps down the track, but defends back towards the bowler
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run fuller and on middle stump, worked towards long-on for a single
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run length ball on legstump, Kohli goes deep in the crease and nudges this behind square leg to bring up the 100
Doherty to Dhoni, 2 runs full and outside off, Dhoni reaches for that one and squeezes that towards deep point
Doherty to Dhoni, no run fuller ball on middle stump, Dhoni stretches forward to reach the pitch of the ball, defended down the track
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run worked towards midwicket by Dhoni to end the over
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run short of length ball on off stump, opens the face as he sends the ball towards deep point
Faulkner to Kohli, no run short of length ball on off stump, steered towards backward point
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run short of length ball on the pads, easy to tap that towards square leg
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run a touch short and that is on leg stump, Dhoni helps that along towards deep backward square leg
Faulkner to Kohli, no run solid in defence as that is pitched up by Faulkner
Faulkner to Kohli, no run length ball is defended towards midwicket
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run length ball on middle, Dhoni again taking a couple of paces down the track, eases the ball towards long-on
Doherty to Kohli, no run solid forward-defensive towards cover
Doherty to Kohli, no run fuller ball on middle, more defence, off the middle of the bat but there's loud lbw appeal
Doherty to Kohli, no run Kohli skips down and unleashes a fierce straight drive, but Doherty manages to get a hand on that
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run drives it inside-out towards long-off
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run too short from Doherty, but he gets away with it, Dhoni slaps that towards deep point
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run Watson returns, on the pads, worked towards deep midwicket
Watson to Kohli, 2 runs powerfully struck towards sweeper cover, Dhoni's leg doesn't seem to be giving him too much trouble as he races back for the second
Watson to Kohli, no run short ball outside off, easy leave
Watson to Kohli, FOUR runs down the leg side, easy for Kohli to put that away, just glances that past the keeper for four
Watson to Kohli, 1 run length ball outside off, guided down towards third man for a single
Watson to Dhoni, no run back of length ball outside off, defended towards point
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run full ball is driven towards long-on for an ambled single
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run sends this towards cow corner
Doherty to Kohli, 2 runs the uber-consistent Kohli gets another half-century, waits on the back foot and chops that towards point
Doherty to Kohli, no run waits for the ball to arrive and steers the ball towards backward point
Doherty to Kohli, 2 runs full ball on the pads, whipped behind square leg
Doherty to Kohli, no run on off and middle stump, Kohli backs away from the stumps and pokes the ball towards point
Watson to Dhoni, 2 runs worked behind square leg for a couple, this time Dhoni seems to be limping a bit, not quite full recovered from that problem he picked up early in this innings
Watson to Dhoni, 2 runs short and wide outside off, powered towards deep point to bring up the 50-run stand
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length outside off, guided towards point
Watson to Kohli, no run length ball just outside off, defended towards cover off the front foot
Watson to Kohli, 1 run short of length ball outside off, guided down towards third man for a single
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run shortish ball outside off, pulled away towards deep square leg
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run nearly gone there, Dhoni charges down thtrack and looks for the big hit towards long-on, thick inside-edge sends the ball towards short fine leg
Doherty to Kohli, no run goes well back in the crease and defends to the right of the bowler, a diving stop from Doherty
Doherty to Kohli, FOUR runs beautiful from Kohli, that inside-out shot that was such a feature of his hundred in Jaipur, making some room and lofts this on the up towards deep extra cover
Doherty to Kohli, no run defended to the off side
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run opens the face as he guides that towards point
Doherty to Dhoni, no run length ball on middle and leg, defended to the leg side
Voges to Kohli, 1 run Adam Voges starts with a juicy loopy full toss, he's really lucky that isn't put away, Kohli can only get a single towards sweeper cover
Voges to Dhoni, no run a dart this time from Voges, defended off the front foot
Voges to Dhoni, 1 run full and just outside off, driven towards long-off
Voges to Kohli, no run full ball is carefully defended by Kohli
Voges to Kohli, 1 run once again Voges gets away with a poor ball, that was quite short, plenty of time for Kohli to rock back and put it away, he slaps it towards deep extra cover
Voges to Dhoni, no run flatter and fuller, tapped towards midwicket
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run exposes the stumps as he backs away and cracks the ball towards point
Doherty to Dhoni, no run the helmet comes off for Dhoni as two spinners are playing, defended off the back foot towards mid-off
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run clipped off the back foot towards square leg for a single
Doherty to Kohli, no run sliding down the leg side, Kohli looking to clip that towards midwicket, misses and is hit on the pads
Doherty to Kohli, no run a firm drive towards cover off the front foot
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run defended towards cover for a single
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run way outside leg stump, worked towards midwicket, no time to come back for the second
Maxwell to Dhoni, 1 run length ball from round the wicket, stays back in the crease and tucks the ball towards square leg
Maxwell to Kohli, FOUR runs well outside off, Kohli has to stretch to reach that, it wasn't too short either, still Kohli waits on the back foot and powers that past cover for four

Maxwell to Kohli, OUT and Maxwell has done it, the massive wicket of Kohli who is dismissed for 68, Kohli gets on the front foot initially, then gets back and looks to power the ball through off, outside off and a thin edge through to the keeper, Kohli is frustrated at having given it away, India's lower order has a big task on their
Maxwell to Jadeja, 1 run worked towards square leg for a single
Maxwell to Dhoni, 1 run a single towards midwicket to end the over
Doherty to Dhoni, no run Dhoni rushes down the track and eases the ball towards mid-on
Doherty to Dhoni, no run short ball but Dhoni can't put it away, mistimes it back towards the bowler
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run softly tucks this towards midwicket for a single
Doherty to Jadeja, 1 run short of length on the pads, worked off the pads towards square leg
Doherty to Dhoni, no run zipping towards off stump, shortish ball that, helped towards extra cover off the back foot
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run eased it past a diving Doherty, towards long-on for a single
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run length ball on middle and leg, driven towards mid-on
Johnson to Jadeja, no run shortish ball on middle stump, Jadeja can't get bat on it as he looks to work that to the leg side

Johnson to Jadeja, OUT the Johnson bouncer gets another victim, speed and aggression from Johnson, Jadeja was looking to run that down towards fine leg, hits him on the gloves and the ball loops through to Haddin, superb bowling change from Bailey to attack the new batsman
Johnson to Ashwin, FOUR runs short of length and outside off, Ashwin is seriously good playing the point towards point, he stylishly sends this away off the back foot past gully for four
Johnson to Ashwin, 1 wide short ball down the leg side
Johnson to Ashwin, no run shortish ball on off stump, Ashwin sways out of the line of that one
Johnson to Ashwin, 2 runs short ball once more, awkward from Ashwin as he keeps that away, off the gloves and behind square leg
Doherty to Dhoni, no run pitched up, on middle and leg, driven to the right of the bowler
Doherty to Dhoni, no run flat, short of length ball that is angling towards legstump, defended
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run turns this towards midwicket, legstump ball that Dhoni delicately places on the leg side
Doherty to Ashwin, no run carefully defended from the crease
Doherty to Ashwin, no run taps this back towards the bowler
Doherty to Ashwin, no run guides this towards short fine leg, just one off that Doherty over
Johnson to Dhoni, FOUR runs full and well outside off, slices it in front of point for four, superbly done by Dhoni, not much in terms of footwork but connects well

Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run ooh, nearly carried all the way to the man at deep point, Dhoni seems to have decided it is time to hit out, he was looking to hit that over extra cover, sliced towards point, lands short of the man there
Johnson to Ashwin, no run fuller and on middle and leg, defended back towards the bowler
Johnson to Ashwin, no run slower one, 126.7kph, short of length and outside off, steered in front of point
Johnson to Ashwin, 1 run short of length ball on legstump, not very well timed but he sends the ball towards midwicket
Johnson to Dhoni, no run well-directed short ball to end the over, Dhoni ducks under it
Faulkner to Ashwin, no run length ball just outside off, driven towards mid-off
Faulkner to Ashwin, no run a bit of width, fluently cut away towards point
Faulkner to Ashwin, 1 run shortish ball just outside off, gets back in the crease and the ball is sent towards deep backward point
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 leg bye short of length ball on the pads, looking to whip that away towards midwicket, off the pads towards the off side
Faulkner to Ashwin, FOUR runs short ball, Faulkner lacks the pace of Faulkner, Ashwin isn't scared of this one, helps it along to the fine-leg boundary
Faulkner to Ashwin, no run driven towards mid-off to end the over
McKay to Dhoni, 1 run short of length ball, Dhoni charges down the track and drives towards cover
McKay to Ashwin, 1 run opens the face and guides the ball towards third man for a single
McKay to Dhoni, no run Dhoni looking to muscle that through the off side, bounces more than he expects and he misses out
McKay to Dhoni, no run length ball is tucked in front of square leg
McKay to Dhoni, no run opens the face as he works this away towards point
McKay to Dhoni, no run short of length ball on middle stump, defended down the track
Faulkner to Ashwin, 1 run square driven towards deep point by Ashwin

Faulkner to Dhoni, FOUR runs short of length ball on the pads, Dhoni not looking to muscle this, tucks this behind square leg, placed perfectly to get a boundary, and another half-century for Dhoni, an ODI all-time great
Faulkner to Dhoni, FOUR runs full toss well outside off, slicing it down to third man for four more
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run length ball well outside off, defended towards mid-off off the front foot
Faulkner to Ashwin, 4 leg byes on the pads, slower ball, Ashwin shuffles across and looks to glance it, but off the pads, wide of Haddin for four leg-byes
Faulkner to Ashwin, no run length ball on off stump, an elegant drive towards mid-off

McKay to Dhoni, 1 run McKay sends down a slower one, only 107kph, Dhoni was looking to initially launch the ball out of the park, had to adjust to the change of pace, ends up jabbing it down the ground for a quick single
McKay to Ashwin, no run length ball on off stump, defended back towards McKay
McKay to Ashwin, 1 run slanting in towards the pads, Ashwin moves across towards off and whips the ball towards deep square leg
McKay to Dhoni, 1 run pitched up, just outside off, worked towards sweeper cover for one more
McKay to Ashwin, 1 run a touch shorter, outside off, dabbed towards short third man
McKay to Dhoni, no run defended towards mid-on, Ashwin is sent back as he starts for the single
Watson to Ashwin, no run Watson starts the over with a length ball that is eased towards midwicket, a diving stop from Bailey
Watson to Ashwin, 1 run short ball on legstump, off the glove as Ashwin looks to pull, the ball rolls towards short fine leg
Watson to Dhoni, no run an appeal for lbw, that looked pretty good from a line and length point of view, but there was a big inside-edge
Watson to Dhoni, 1 leg bye Dhoni looking to whip the ball towards the leg side, misses and is hit on the pads, that was sliding down
Watson to Ashwin, 1 run shortish ball, pulled away towards deep backward square leg for a single
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run length ball heading for off stump, dropped towards cover for a quick single, the Powerplay is over
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run Faulkner from over the wicket, a length ball is worked towards square leg
Faulkner to Ashwin, no run full ball just outside off, blocked back towards the bowler
Faulkner to Ashwin, no run angling across Ashwin, who was looking to help the ball along to third man, he can't connect
Faulkner to Ashwin, 1 run sends this one towards deep point to bring up India's 200
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run back of the hand slower ball, full and outside off, Dhoni can't time it as he looks launch towards long-on, towards midwicket for a single
Faulkner to Ashwin, 1 run nicely done by Ashwin, lofts that over the infield towards sweeper cover, a controlled hit for a single
Doherty to Ashwin, 1 run full ball on the stumps, driven towards long-on for a single
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run another easy single towards long-on
Doherty to Ashwin, 1 run gets well back in the crease and works this towards square leg for a single
Doherty to Dhoni, no run Dhoni takes a couple of paces down the track, but he's not in place to play the big shot, tucks this to midwicket
Doherty to Dhoni, SIX runs there's the first six of the match, it was short from Doherty, Dhoni gets the front leg out of the way and muscles it over midwicket, the crowd finds its voice

Doherty to Dhoni, FOUR runs Dhoni skips down the track to get near the pitch of the ball and pounds that one to the midwicket boundary, four more, Doherty's final two deliveries go for 10 runs, he still finishes with a respectable 10-0-45-0
Watson to Ashwin, 1 run length ball outside off, Ashwin opens the face to guide the ball towards third man for a single
Watson to Dhoni, 2 runs short ball, Dhoni goes for the big hit, top edges the pull and the ball rolls towards deep backward square leg, Dhoni pushes Ashwin to return for the second
Watson to Dhoni, FOUR runs this time he connects superbly with the pull, he wasn't looking to give it everything, more worried about placing it, sends this to the deep square leg boundary
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run slanting in towards the pads, driven towards long-on

Watson to Ashwin, FOUR runs superbly done by Ashwin, innovative batting there from the No. 8, it was another short ball from Watson, Ashwin initially wanted to stand tall and pull it away, then decides to bend his knee to get under the ball and dink it down to fine leg for four
Watson to Ashwin, no run length ball just outside off, Ashwin shuffles across and pushes it towards mid-on, too firmly to have time to get a single
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run he starts with a full ball on the stumps, works the ball towards square leg
Johnson to Ashwin, 1 run 140kph, pitched up and just outside off, guided towards short third man
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 leg bye looking to pull the slower bouncer, 129kph, Dhoni is through with the shot a touch early, bottom edge on to his body, just the single

Johnson to Ashwin, OUT is that a caught-behind? Ashwin was looking to dab the ball down to third man once more, it's a shot that has been very profitable for him over his career, gets a thick edge, and that is a terrific take from Haddin, leaping to his left and plucking a low chance, the umpires want to double check that it carried,
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, no run short of length ball just outside off, defended towards point
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run full and quick, on middle stump, squeezed out towards short third man
Watson to Bhuvneshwar, no run Watson also sticking to the short-ball strategy, bhuvneshwar looks to chop that outside-off delivery, doesn't connect
Watson to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run length ball just outside off, Bhuvneshwar Kumar guides that towards deep point, he looks a better batsman than a usual No. 9
Watson to Dhoni, SIX runs Dhoni power! that is pitched up and absolutely drilled by Dhoni for six over long-off, brutal hit that, no doubt it was going to clear the rope
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run short ball just outside off, helped along to deep backward square leg for a single
Watson to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run slanting in towards legstump, clipped towards square leg
Watson to Dhoni, FOUR runs short ball down the leg side, Dhoni looking to pull that one, bit of an edge, but enough to go wide of Haddin to the fine-leg boundary
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, no run Johnson starts his final over with his favourite weapon, Bhuvneshwar Kumar ducks under it
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run short of length ball around off, Bhuvneshwar does well to poke it towards point and get off strike
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run slower one from Johnson, 128kph, Dhoni gets it towards long-on for a single
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, no run length ball on off stump, defended towards point, two balls of Johnson to go
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, no run length ball on off stump once more, just two off this over so far, defended towards point for one more
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, no run no five-for for Johnson, but it has been a superb spell form him, he ends with 4-46, his final delivery is worked towards midwicket by Bhuvneshwar
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run full and wide, lashed towards mid-off by Dhoni
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run full and well outside off, Dhonoi has to stretch as he tries reaching that, off the bottom of the bat, the ball rolls towards cover
Faulkner to Bhuvneshwar, no run short of length and just outside off, great line for the tailender, Bhuvneshwar chases it and is beaten
Faulkner to Bhuvneshwar, no run this time Bhuvneshwar defends towards short midwicket
Faulkner to Bhuvneshwar, no run looks to power this full ball down the ground, can't get it past Faulkner
Faulkner to Bhuvneshwar, no run slower one to finish, terrific over from Faulkner, just one off it, the final ball was heading for middle stump, Bhuvneshwar has to block it
McKay to Dhoni, 1 leg bye slanting down the pads, helped down to fine leg for a single
McKay to Bhuvneshwar, FOUR runs slower one from McKay, Bhuvneshwar spots it early, moves away a touch, steps down the track and launches it over mid-off
McKay to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run powered towards mid-off for a single, Dhoni back on strike
McKay to Dhoni, 1 run short ball, Dhoni looking to pull that away powerfully, he can't connect properly, off the glove I think, the ball rolls towards square leg
McKay to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run another slower one, Bhuvneshwar was going for the mow to midwicket, thick edge sends the ball onto his pad, rolls away to allow a single

McKay to Dhoni, 1 run short ball sat up for Dhoni, who uncharacteristically doesn't put it away, he got plenty of power as he flatbatted it towards long-on but not wide enough of Mitchell Johnson, just a single but Dhoni won't mind too much as it brings him back on strike
Faulkner to Dhoni, FOUR runs mid-off was in the circle, Dhoni was all too aware of that, he gets under that low wide full toss, slices it just over mid-off for four, Dhoni on to 98

Faulkner to Dhoni, FOUR runs there's the first ODI century by an Indian batsman in Mohali, Dhoni has delivered another ODI masterclass, Faulkner bowling it full and wide, Dhoni doesn't get too much on it, but enough to send it to the third-man boundary for four
Faulkner to Dhoni, 2 runs sends this one towards deep square leg, Dhoni puses for the second, Bhuvneshwar just makes it in time, third umpire needed to decided
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run Faulkner has decided the way to bowl to Dhoni is full and very wide, Dhoni reaches out and chops that towards deep point
Faulkner to Bhuvneshwar, OUT short ball gets another wicket, Bhiuvneshwar goes for the pull but slices that high and it ends as an easy catch to Bailey at midwicket
Faulkner to Vinay, no run short of length ball on middle and leg, Vinay gets behind the line of that and defends

Watson to Dhoni, 2 runs dropped, Watson bowls it full and wide, for once Dhoni doesn't middle it as he goes for the big hit, that hit low on the bat and slices it towards cover, Bailey has plenty of time to get under it, waits for it to arrive and spills what should have been a straightforward catch
Watson to Dhoni, FOUR runs ho ho ho, Dhoni power, one ball after being dropped, drilled between the bowler and mid-off for four, brutally struck
Watson to Dhoni, 1 wide wide outside off

Watson to Dhoni, no run full and wide once more, Dhoni looks to power it down the ground once more, bottom hand comes off the bat as he tries the shot, the ball rolls towards mid-on, Dhoni declines the single
Watson to Dhoni, no run smashes this towards the leg side, another run declined
Watson to Dhoni, SIX runs that's why he didn't want to turn over the strike, pitched up, Dhoni pummels that for a massive six over long-off, power-hitting at its best
Watson to Dhoni, 1 wide much too wide from Watson, he is under immense pressure when bowling to a master finisher like Dhoni
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run full and wide once more, not so wide that is deemed illegal, Dhoni chips it towards sweeper cover for a single
Faulkner to Dhoni, FOUR runs Dhoni begins the final over with a boundary, short of length ball is slugged towards midwicket, Dhoni has galloped to 122 now
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run full and wide, the yorker is squeezed out towards deep point, another single refused by Dhoni

Faulkner to Dhoni, SIX runs there's the helicopter, the crowd is loving it, Australia are hating it, what a player this man is, it wa sa length ball just outside off, Dhoni waits on the back foot and absolutely clobbers that over long-on
Faulkner to Dhoni, SIX runs six more for Dhoni, full from Faulkner, this time Dhoni goes over long-off, all the wieght o nthe back foot as he pounds that one for six more
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run, OUT lashes this one towards long-on for a single, there wasn't really a chance of getting two, but Dhoni rightly wanted to be back on strike and Vinay sacrifices his wicket

Faulkner to Dhoni, FOUR runs sensational finish from Dhoni, this was full and on the pads, flicked off powerfully for a four, India have gone past 300 here, Dhoni ends on 139 off 122, who would want to be a bowler when Dhoni is going bonkers like this?
Right, I don't know about Dhoni, but I certainly need a few minutes to get my breath back. See you all again at 5.45pm.
The praise is pouring in for Dhoni.

Unbelievably good batting from MS Dhoni, but India fans have come to expect it almost as a norm in ODIs. Mitchell Johnson seemed to have India on the ropes early on, but Kohli and Dhoni stabilised the innings, before Dhoni absolutely took apart the bowling in the final few overs.

We have plenty of MSD fans here, but do you think you are Tendulkar's biggest fan? Here's a chance to prove it. Upload a snappy, entertaining two-minute video that captures your love for Tendulkar. It could feature you imitating his mannerisms, or doing a spot of mimicry. Give us a tour of that room in your house dedicated to Tendulkar memo
5.50pm Indian players in a huddle and out march Aaron Finch and Phil Hughes. Bhuvneshwar Kumar with the new ball and two slips. Here we go...
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run inswinger on length and nips back into Hughes who is crammed up for room
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run on length and no swing this time, Hughes stays back and defends it back to the bowler
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run angling away after pitching on off, Hughes defends it off the back foot
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, 1 run outside off this time, Hughes cuts and gets a single with a bottom edge on the off side
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run outside off on length and shapes away, Finch poked and missed it completely without any footwork
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, FOUR runs boundary to end the over! This one was wider outside off and Finch crashed it past point for a four
Vinay to Hughes, 1 wide pithes it outside leg and goes down further for a wide
Vinay to Hughes, 4 leg byes down leg again but Dhoni doesn't give it a try this time. It may not have been out of his reach but he stared back at Vinay after it went for four
Vinay to Hughes, no run on length on the stumps, defends it back
Vinay to Hughes, 1 run on leg and shaping into Hughes, he works it to deep fine leg
Vinay to Finch, no run length ball on off with a bit of outswing, pushed towards cover
Vinay to Finch, no run on the off side again, it was swinging away, Finch drove and a good stop at cover saves a few runs
Vinay to Finch, 1 run edged but out of reach of the fielders. It was short of length, Finch was on the back foot and a thick outside edge flew to third man
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run on length outside off, Finch cuts and misses
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, FOUR runs Finch gets room and puts it away easily. It was short too, he didn't have to do much but stay back and drive it through the covers
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run outside off on length, defends it to cover
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run on length on off, defends it back
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run angled into the batsman from length on off, driven down straight to mid-on
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run angled in again from outside off, Finch pushes it to mid-off
Vinay to Hughes, no run outside off, Hughes stays back to drive it to cover
Vinay to Hughes, no run on length outside off, leans forward to defend it on off
Vinay to Hughes, FOUR runs wider and shorter outside off, Hughes spotted it early and hopped on his toes on the back foot to push punch it between point and extra cover for four
Vinay to Hughes, no run fuller outside off, goes down on a knee to drive it to point
Vinay to Hughes, 2 runs short of length on middle and off, tucked on the leg side for two quick runs off the back foot
Vinay to Hughes, no run short of length outside off, hops back to defend it
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 leg bye big appeal but it was going down leg. It was short of length and swinging into the batsman, even struck him just outside leg on the pads
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, 1 leg bye angled into the pads again, goes down leg for another leg bye
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, FOUR runs full on the stumps, Finch doesn't have to move much as he crashes it straight down the ground for four
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 leg bye another lbw appeal and it was going down leg again as it swung in and Australia get another leg bye after Finch missed it
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run short of length on leg stump, worked on the leg side
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run towards the leg stump, pushed on the leg side
Sharma to Finch, 1 run angled into from off, defends it delicately on the leg side
Sharma to Hughes, FOUR runs slightly full outside off and it's enough for Hughes to punch it through the covers, another four
Sharma to Hughes, no run on length outside off, defends it on the off side
Sharma to Hughes, no run outside off again, Hughes stays back to defend it on off
Sharma to Hughes, no run close to the stumps on the off side, Hughes defends it again
Sharma to Hughes, 1 run on the pads now, nudges it to deep fine leg to keep strike
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run back of length on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on

Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run big appeal as it might have struck the pad first. Length delivery on leg and heading towards the stumps, Indian players see a chance and appeal but it was too close to see if it struck pas first
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, 1 run pushed to mid-on from length for a single
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 2 runs angled into Finch from length, turned to deep backward square leg for two
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run angled in again from off, pushed to mid-on
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run on length towards off stump, driven down to long-off for a single
Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs not a bad delivery this one but it's been put away for four! Short of length outside off, Finch stayed back and punched it through the covers for a boundary
Sharma to Finch, no run on length on the off stump, pushed down to mid-off
Sharma to Finch, 1 leg bye on the leg stump and going down, Finch tried to flick it hard but gets a leg bye to deep fine leg
Sharma to Hughes, FOUR runs short of length on leg, runs it down the leg side fine for another four. Boundaries coming easy for Australia with these two on the crease
Sharma to Hughes, no run back of length again but moving towards off this time, defends it off the back foot
Sharma to Hughes, no run length delivery on the stumps, it kept low as Hughes stayed back and tucked it to midwicket
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 2 runs full outside off, driven handsomely through the covers but long-off runs to deep cover to keep it to two
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, FOUR runs edged and goes where second slip would have been for four. It was outside off and the outside edge flew right past Ashwin at first slip, well outside his reach
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run lbw appeal but it's going down leg again as it swung too much when it struck him on the pads
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run angled in towards off, pushed down the ground towards mid-on
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 2 runs swinging in towards the pads, flicked past midwicket for easy two
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, FOUR runs well outside off, another four from Finch's bat. It was short too and he timed it very well between extra cover and point for four, nobody moved
Sharma to Hughes, FOUR runs take one more! Short ball outside off and Hughes spotted it early to pull it to deep midwicket for four
Sharma to Hughes, no run on the off stump on length, defends it off the back foot
Sharma to Hughes, no run length delivery on off again, Hughes stays on the back foot to defend towards cover
Sharma to Hughes, no run bouncer on the leg stump and Hughes ducks. First bouncer for the over
Sharma to Hughes, no run length delivery outside off, blocked off the back foot
Sharma to Hughes, no run slightly shorter on leg and surprises Hughes with the bounce a bit, defends it on the pitch
Vinay to Finch, no run on the off stump, stays back to push it to cover

Vinay to Finch, no run big appeal and Virat Kohli is furious after taking a diving catch at point. It was a bouncer, Finch pulled and it lobbed towards point off the shoulder, Kohli jumped forward and caught it. Replays suggest there was no bat
Vinay to Finch, no run angled into the stumps, defends it in the crease
Vinay to Finch, no run length delivery on off, no movement and pushed back to the bowler
Vinay to Finch, no run another bouncer and no bat again, went straight to Dhoni this time
Vinay to Finch, 1 wide on leg and goes down further for a wide
Vinay to Finch, 2 runs length ball around off, pushed easily down the ground for two by the time long-off gets it
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run length delivery on the pads, pushed to mid-on
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run outside off on length, bottom edge stays close to Hughes who says no for the single
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run fuller on off, driven down to mid-off
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run on the stumps on length, stays low as Hughes defends it
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run aimed towards the stumps again and Hughes blocks it
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run slightly slower on middle and off, cut late to point., first maiden of the innings
Vinay to Finch, 1 leg bye angled into the pads, run down to fine leg for a leg bye
Vinay to Watson, no run short ball on off, Watson defends off the back foot
Vinay to Watson, no run bouncer around off and swinging away, Watson leaves
Vinay to Watson, 1 run on length on the stumps, tucked to midwicket and he's of the mark
Vinay to Finch, no run on length on off, defends to mid-on
Bhuvneshwar to Watson, 2 runs inside edge goes to deep fine leg. It was well outside off but nipped in late and a drive attempted by Watson just missed the stumps
Bhuvneshwar to Watson, no run on length outside off, pushes it to cover
Bhuvneshwar to Watson, no run full and outside off, driven well but straight to mid-off
Bhuvneshwar to Watson, FOUR runs short ball and pulled away for four! It went high up in the air but had the distance too and was quite far from deep square leg
Bhuvneshwar to Watson, no run aimed at the stumps, pushed to cover this time and Raina gets a direct hit at non-striker's which nearly gave an overthrow
Bhuvneshwar to Watson, no run short of length outside off, driven down to mid-off
Vinay to Finch, no run length ball on off, driven down to mid-off where Dhawan fumbles a bit
Vinay to Finch, 1 run short ball on middle and leg, pulled to deep fine leg for a single
Vinay to Watson, 2 runs fuller on the stumps, flicked to deep square leg for easy two
Vinay to Watson, 1 wide bouncer outside off, Watson leaves and a late call from the umpire calls it a wide
Vinay to Watson, no run through the gate! On length outside off, Watson drove, reaching out but it nipped in slightly and went right through him to Dhoni
Vinay to Watson, no run on length on off, driven dow to mid-off
Vinay to Watson, no run short of length around off, Watson stays back and defends it back to the bowler
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run short of length angled in towards the stumps, turned to mid-on
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run on length on off, defended back to the bowler
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run shorter outside off, driven down easily to long-off
Bhuvneshwar to Watson, no run on the stumps this time, pushed down to mid-on
Bhuvneshwar to Watson, 1 run short of length outside off, Watson cuts it late to third man
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run full and wide, driven to sweeper cover for one
Sharma to Finch, no run outside off and Finch pushes it to cover
Sharma to Finch, no run wider outside off, Finch gets a bottom edge inside the crease

Sharma to Finch, OUT umpire raises the finger! Ishant has struck even though it struck him in front of leg and may have gone down leg. He angled it in, Finch was crammed for room on the back foot and the Indian players went up for Shamsuddin to raise his finger. It was very very close, hard to say if it was hitting or missing
Sharma to Bailey, no run on length outside off, Bailey lets it go
Sharma to Bailey, no run on length outside off, defends on the off side
Sharma to Bailey, no run on length and nipping in a bit, Bailey defends to end the wicket maiden
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run full on leg, tucked on the leg side for one
Jadeja to Bailey, no run flighted on middle and leg with some turn as Bailey defends
Jadeja to Bailey, no run on leg and turn again as a thick outside edge goes square on off
Jadeja to Bailey, no run on length on leg and going down as there's a futile appeal for lbw
Jadeja to Bailey, no run quicker on length towards the stumps as Bailey goes back to defend
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run shorter on leg, turned to deep square leg off the back foot and he's off the mark
Sharma to Bailey, no run angled into the batsman from length, Bailey defends
Sharma to Bailey, no run outside off this time on length, driven to cover
Sharma to Bailey, FOUR runs full on the pads, flicked on the leg side in the air and well connected from Bailey as it goes past the rope after a bounce
Sharma to Bailey, no run on length well outside off, doesn't middle it as he sends it towards cover
Sharma to Bailey, no run nips in a bit form length outside off as Bailey pushes it to point
Sharma to Bailey, no run length ball outside off, he pushes to cover and it sent back in time for the single as Rohit got the ball in no time
Jadeja to Voges, 1 run on length on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket for one
Jadeja to Bailey, no run full on leg, Bailey defends awkwardly on the leg side
Jadeja to Bailey, no run full on the stumps, blocks this time
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run flighted and full on leg, driven down to long-off
Jadeja to Voges, no run on length on the stumps, defends it on the leg side
Sharma to Bailey, 1 run length ball on the stumps, turned on the leg side for one
Sharma to Voges, no run 137.1 kph, short of length outside off, Voges defends off the back foot
Sharma to Voges, no run length ball on off, defends it back
Sharma to Voges, no run length delivery just outside off, Voges leans forward and drives to mid-off
Sharma to Voges, no run on length outside off again, driven on the off side
Sharma to Voges, 1 run short ball on off, pulled to deep midwicket for one
Jadeja to Voges, no run full on leg, tucked on the leg side
Jadeja to Voges, no run shorter and keeps low as Voges goes back to defend
Jadeja to Voges, no run on length on the stumps, leans forward to defend it
Jadeja to Voges, 1 run flighted on middle, Voges comes down and turns it to long-on
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run on lenght on middle and leg, he goes back and turns it to deep midwicket
Jadeja to Voges, 1 run full on middle, driven down to long-off
Yuvraj to Voges, 1 run flighted and full outside leg, pushed to long-on
Yuvraj to Bailey, no run short ball and going down leg, he can't get it past short fine leg
Yuvraj to Bailey, no run in the air after an edge but falls short of cover. It was on length on leg but the turn produced an outside edge
Yuvraj to Bailey, FOUR runs down leg again and Bailey does well to stays back and send it past short fine leg for a four with a pull
Yuvraj to Bailey, no run on leg, Bailey sweeps but can't connect well
Yuvraj to Bailey, no run flighted on off, pushed to mid-off after leaning forward
Jadeja to Voges, 1 run slower on the stumps, Voges turns it to deep midwicket
Jadeja to Bailey, no run quicker on leg, plays it to Kohli at forward short leg
Jadeja to Bailey, no run shorter on the stumps, Bailey makes room and pushes to cover
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run full on middle and leg, driven down to long-on
Jadeja to Voges, no run outside leg and going down but they appeal as Voges couldn't get bat on that
Jadeja to Voges, 1 wide goes down the leg side for a wide
Jadeja to Voges, 2 runs on length on leg, Voges comes down and turns it to deep midwicket
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 wide a wide from Yuvraj down leg as Bailey tried to sweep
Yuvraj to Bailey, no run on length on off, pushed to cover
Yuvraj to Bailey, 2 runs sways down leg again and Bailey goes down on a knee to pull it to deep fine leg
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 leg bye going down leg again, hits him on the pad for a leg bye
Yuvraj to Voges, no run slower on length outside off, defends towards cover
Yuvraj to Voges, no run on length on middle, defends it back to the bowler
Yuvraj to Voges, no run full and outside off, driven firmly straight to cover
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 wide speared down the leg side
Jadeja to Bailey, no run angling into the pads, looking to work it to the leg side, but can't get it away
Jadeja to Bailey, no run not giving any room at all, going with the angle, defended
Jadeja to Bailey, no run blocked off the front foot, batsman trying to make room but the angle isn't giving him any
Jadeja to Bailey, 2 runs waits on the backfoot and whips it towards square leg
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run length ball on middle and leg, pushed to the off side for a quick single
Jadeja to Voges, no run full ball on middle, pushed firmly off the front foot to the right of the bowler
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 run blocked towards cover for a quick single
Yuvraj to Voges, 1 run just short of length, waits on the back foot and tucks it towards midwicket
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 run angling into legstump once more, an inside-out push towards cover
Yuvraj to Voges, FOUR runs bit of flight this time, and it isn't on middle and leg line, more on off, gives the room for the batsman to cut it away through point for four
Yuvraj to Voges, 1 run length ball on off stump, eased towards long-off for a single

Yuvraj to Bailey, FOUR runs short and wide from Yuvraj, asking to be hit on a track where not much is happening for the spinners, duly put away through extra cover for four more, good over for Australia this
Jadeja to Voges, 1 run Jadeja drops it a bit short as he plugs away on legstump, swept away for a single
Jadeja to Bailey, no run defended off the back foot to the off side
Jadeja to Bailey, no run length ball on middle and leg, Jadeja getting through his overs quickly, defended off the front foot to the off side
Jadeja to Bailey, no run length ball on off stump, not much turn here, bowling it quick, driven towards mid-off
Jadeja to Bailey, no run blocked off the front foot towards point, just a single off this over
Jadeja to Bailey, no run short of length, on middle and leg, more defence, and Jadeja now has figures of 6-0-17-1, what happened to all that dew which was supposed to cause problems?
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run sweeps the first ball from off stump, fine towards fine leg for a single
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run short of length ball pitching outside off, Bailey tucks it towards square leg
Ashwin to Voges, no run back of a length once more, on middle and leg, defended
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run down towards fine leg for one more
Ashwin to Bailey, SIX runs flighted from Ashwin, and that is smashed for six, it was a nice length, Bailey gets under it and hammers it towards cow corner for the first six of the innings
Ashwin to Bailey, no run defended down the track to end the over
Jadeja to Voges, no run short of length and outside off, carved towards point
Jadeja to Voges, no run defended towards the off side
Jadeja to Voges, no run sees the batsman advancing and bowls it short, blocked back towards the bowler
Jadeja to Voges, no run steps out of the crease once more, Jadeja bowls this outside off for a change, Voges can only block to the off side
Jadeja to Voges, 1 leg bye reverts to his leg side line, off the pads for a legbye
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run short of length ball on off stump, worked off the back foot towards long-on for a single
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run fullish ball is swept firmly towards deep square leg, just a single as the placement isn't great
Ashwin to Voges, no run from round the wicket, a length ball is defended
Ashwin to Voges, no run blocked down the track
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run
Ashwin to Bailey, FOUR runs bit of width there, and too short, slapped behind point for four more
Ashwin to Bailey, no run bowling from round the wicket, from well away from the stumps, blocked back to the bowler
Jadeja to Voges, no run Jadeja continues, bowls it flat and outside off, defended to the off side
Jadeja to Voges, no run fired in towards middle, tapped back towards the bowler
Jadeja to Voges, 1 run on a length around middle and off, played off the back foot towards point
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run uller and on middle and leg, clipped behind square leg for one more
Jadeja to Voges, 1 run short of length ball is driven towards long-off for another single
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run opens the face to guide the ball behind point for another single, ends another quiet over from Jadeja
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run drifts away outside off, whipped towards square leg
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run worked to square leg for a single
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run goes for the quicker one, 91kph, was much too short and is fortunate that isn't put away for four, to deep midwicket for a single
Ashwin to Voges, no run defended to the leg side
Ashwin to Voges, FOUR runs spinning away, that was well outside off and going further away, giving the room to chop it behind point, too short as well
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run the regulation offbreak, nudged to the leg side for a single
Jadeja to Voges, no run Jadeja continues to bowl it flat and on legstump, defended back to the bowler
Jadeja to Voges, 1 run a touch shorter, and on middle, driven off the back foot towards mid-on
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run on the pads once more, 94kph, worked towards short fine leg
Jadeja to Voges, no run short of length ball, shortening the length as he saw the batsman come down the track, defended
Jadeja to Voges, 1 run driven towards extra cover for a single this time
Jadeja to Bailey, no run length ball on legstump, defended off the front foot, Jadeja ends another over where hardly anything is scored

Vinay to Voges, 2 runs short of length ball outside off, chopped behind backward point, Ashwin puts in the dive near the rope, has he touched the boundary as he tried to save it, we'll need a few replays, looks okay to me, and to the third umpire as well
Vinay to Voges, no run beauty from Vinay Kumar, moving away late after pitching back of a length on off stump, Voges clueless against that one, has a smile on his face after being beaten
Vinay to Voges, no run length ball is driven firmly towards mid-on
Vinay to Voges, FOUR runs short ball outside off, tennis-style shot as he forehands it away from well outside off towards cow corner, Voges gets on his toes to make sure he is in control of that
Vinay to Voges, no run on middle stump this time, fuller than the previous, pushed towards midwicket
Vinay to Voges, 1 run short of length, angling into the pads, clipped towards deep square leg
Jadeja to Voges, no run full ball on off stump, pushed back towards the bowler
Jadeja to Voges, FOUR runs too short and outside off, chopped towards point for four, not much room for that shot but Voges connects well
Jadeja to Voges, no run whipped towards mid-on, another dot ball
Jadeja to Voges, 1 run length ball on middle and leg, defended to the leg side and they sprint a single
Jadeja to Bailey, no run short of length, skidding on towards leg stump, blocked off the back foot
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run Jadeja ends with 1 for 31 off his 10 overs, Dhoni will be happy with that, the final ball was guided towards backward point for a single
Vinay to Bailey, no run first ball is defended back towards Vinay
Vinay to Maxwell, no run bouncer from Vinay to welcome Maxwell
Vinay to Maxwell, 2 runs looking to swing that to the leg side, gets a couple behind square leg
Vinay to Maxwell, 1 run short ball once more, Vinay looking to bang it in this over, went for the pull, off the glove after he went through with the shot, ball rolls over to the off side

Vinay to Voges, OUT short of length ball just outside off, oh my, what is going on here? a run-out after a major mix-up, Voges pushes it towards mid-on, he sets off for the single, Maxwell does too, but after taking about four steps, Voges has second thoughts and pauses, Maxwell is well out of the blocks by now, Dhawan pounces on the
Sharma to Haddin, no run short of length ball just outside off, defended to the off side
Sharma to Haddin, 1 run short of length ball outside off, guided towards third man
Sharma to Voges, 1 run short of length ball, guided down towards third man for one more
Sharma to Haddin, 2 runs shortish ball, looks to hammer that to the leg side, the pull is badly timed, just wide of mid-on
Sharma to Haddin, 1 run short of length and well outside off, the typical Ishant ball, was caned towards cover, Kohli dives to his right to get a hand on that
Sharma to Voges, FOUR runs short of length ball, another tennis shot, fiercely struck boundary, that one races past deep midwicket for four
Ashwin to Haddin, 1 run Ashwin spins in his first ball, the conventional offspinner, worked towards square leg
Ashwin to Voges, 2 runs length ball on middle, clipped towards deep square for a couple
Ashwin to Voges, 2 runs down the leg side, swept firmly towards deep backward square leg for two more
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run towards deep midwicket this time, Voges gets to his half-century
Ashwin to Haddin, 1 run full ball is defended towards mid-on for a single
Ashwin to Voges, no run short ball on off stump, think he was looking to get that to spin away, slapped towards cover
Kohli to Haddin, 2 runs just outside off, length ball is pushed towards wide long-on, time enough to take two
Kohli to Haddin, SIX runs that was a terrible delivery, midway down the pitch, sat up and an easy put away, slammed over midwicket for six
Kohli to Haddin, FOUR runs length is fine but line is poor this time, slanting down the leg side, helped along past short fine leg for four more
Kohli to Haddin, FOUR runs more average bowling (to be polite) from Kohli, half-volley on the pads, whipped away to the square-leg boundary for four more
Kohli to Haddin, 1 wide fired down the legside, Dhoni appeals for a catch, think it hit the pad on the way through
Kohli to Haddin, no run down the leg side once more, off the pads towards square leg
Kohli to Haddin, 1 run full ball on middle and leg, driven towards long-on for a single
Ashwin to Haddin, no run Ashwin round the wicket, flighted and full outside leg stump, driven towards mid-on
Ashwin to Haddin, 1 run pitched up, outside leg, nudged to the leg side for a single
Ashwin to Voges, 2 runs good reverse-sweep there from Voges, but equally good work from Ishant at backward point, saves a couple of runs
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run a touch short, quicker as well, powered towards midwicket for a single
Ashwin to Haddin, 1 leg bye the carrom ball, spinning towards the pads, a leg bye towards square leg

Ashwin to Voges, no run looks to reverse-sweep once more, down the leg side, called a wide, in fact the umpire has now changed his mind, decides that is not a wide, Shamsuddin having a horror day out there, that was a huge wide
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, no run length ball outside off, guided towards point
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, no run pushed towards point, no run for Faulkner
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run back of a length and outside off, driven towards sweeper cover, Dhawan races in from the rope, keeps the batsmen down to a single
Bhuvneshwar to Voges, 2 runs short of length angling in towards legstump, worked towards deep square leg for a couple
Bhuvneshwar to Voges, no run same length and outside off, batsman had moved away from the stumps, looks to chop that through the off side, doesn't connect
Ashwin to Faulkner, 1 run pushed back towards the bowler, not sure the batsmen knew much about that one
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run thumps that shortish ball towards deep square leg
Ashwin to Faulkner, 1 run full ball outside leg stump, whipped towards midwicket
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run drops it short once more, pulled firmly but only a single to deep midwicket
Ashwin to Faulkner, no run Ashwin bowling from round the stumps keeping it outside leg and heading for the stumps, a leading edge pops back towards the bowler
Ashwin to Faulkner, 1 run final ball is turned towards square leg
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run drilled towards long-on for a single, Australia not finding the boundaries they desperately need
Bhuvneshwar to Voges, 1 run mistimed shot, a flatbatted shot sends the ball towards long-on
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, SIX runs there's one of those boundaries, short ball is slugged over midwicket for six, power hitting from Faulkner
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run full ball is drilled towards long-off for a single
Bhuvneshwar to Voges, no run a full toss that should have been put away, instead Voges can only thump it back towards the bowler
Bhuvneshwar to Voges, no run full and wide outside off, Voges looking to play a cute shot towards the leg side, doesn't connect
Ashwin to Faulkner, 2 wide way down the leg side, Dhoni can't collect as well, and the batsmen take a run
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run full ball on middle, driven towards long-on
Ashwin to Faulkner, 1 run length ball, on legstump, worked towards midwicket

Ashwin to Voges, no run length ball is driven firmly back at the bowler, hits Ashwin's hand and goes on to hit the non-striker's stumps, the third umpire is called for, Faulkner had his backfoot in though
Ashwin to Voges, 2 runs swept towards fine leg for a couple
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run way outside off stump, Voges has to stretch out to get to that one, stabs it towards point
Ashwin to Faulkner, 1 run defended towards point for a single
Vinay to Faulkner, 2 runs short of length ball is clubbed towards cow corner but not enough to beat the fielder
Vinay to Faulkner, FOUR runs short ball from Vinay, batsman looking to hammer the ball to the leg side, that was top edged over the keeper for a one-bounce four, streaky but Faulkner won't care
Vinay to Faulkner, 2 runs length ball outside off, hammered towards cover where the diving fielder gets a hand on it
Vinay to Faulkner, 1 run slammed towards wide long-on for a single
Vinay to Voges, FOUR runs short of length ball, steers this wide of the man at third man for four, nicely placed that to get Australia past 250
Vinay to Voges, 1 run short of length once more, badly mistimed as he looks to power the ball, a single to mid-off
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run bowling from wide of the stumps, from round the stumps, fired in wide of off, pushed for a single
Ashwin to Faulkner, 1 run batsman backing away, Ashwin follows him, off the pads
Ashwin to Voges, FOUR runs short of length and that is powerfully swept to the square leg boundary for four, it was the carrom ball once more, too short from Ashwin
Ashwin to Voges, 1 leg bye well outside leg and heading for the pads, Voges looks to sweep but can't connect
Ashwin to Faulkner, 1 leg bye again off the pads as the batsman shuffles around in the crease, the legstump line from Ashwin from round the wicket isn't making it easy for Australia
Ashwin to Voges, no run fired across the stumps, looking for a big hit but he misses, and the ball misses off stump as it goes through to the keeper

Sharma to Faulkner, FOUR runs full and wide, Faulkner throws the bat at that and connects well, that soars over extra cover for four, the first ball is hit for a boundary and the 50 partnership comes up

Sharma to Faulkner, SIX runs what an amazing hit that is, this was short from Ishant, sat up for Faulkner, who clobbers that to cow corner, he enjoyed that shot, it went a long way beyond the rope, 10 off the first two balls, what will Ishant serve up now? first he has to get the ball back, it went into the crowd and hasn't been retu

Sharma to Faulkner, SIX runs superb hit from Faulkner, that was a length ball, hit me it shouted, Faulkner obliged,that is as straight as they come, over the sightscreen, and some fans in the crowd hang their heads in disappointment
Sharma to Faulkner, 2 runs goes short this time, Faulkner is swinging at everything, connects well, but only a couple to deep square leg

Sharma to Faulkner, SIX runs another six, this game has turned on its head in five deliveries, fans are stunned into silence as Faulkner reels off another six, another short ball and that is hooked behind square leg for another six

Sharma to Faulkner, SIX runs SIX MORE, what on earth? Ishant Sharma had his critics before this game, there aren't going to be many people backing him after this, short once more, another pull, right off the middle off the bat, and that sails into the crowd once more, corwd not sure whether to be gobsmacked by this hitting from Faulk
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run on the pads, that is clipped towards short fine leg for a single, 13 need off 11
Ashwin to Faulkner, 1 run another single to short fine leg
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run carrom ball spinning in towards the stumps, worked behind square from one more
Ashwin to Faulkner, no run short of length ball outside leg, dot ball as he pushes that to the right of the bowler
Ashwin to Faulkner, 1 run swiped towards deep midwicket for one more, just four off the over
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run full and outside leg, whipped towards deep square leg for another single, just five from that over, who do they turn to for the final over now? nine needed off it
Vinay to Voges, 1 run starts with a full toos from round the wicket on leg stump, chipped towards long-on for a single
Vinay to Faulkner, 2 runs full ball is whipped towards wide long-on, Jadeja has to race across to his right , exceptional effort there from Jadeja to save two runs

Vinay to Faulkner, SIX runs a full toss from vinay on legstump, Faulkner doesn't care about the three men in the deep, backs himself to clear them and he does, a massive hit to finish off the game, Faulkner savours the moment, what an innings from him, brought Australia back from the dead, that was frankly an awful ball from Vinay, V

Thanks everyone for all the mails through the day. Abhishek Purohit is frantically trying to capture all that happened in the game in his match report. I'll see you all in the fourth ODI - spend the interim pondering what changes India should/will make to their bowling. G'night.

Oh boy, what a finish that was. India's death over bowling was always a concern, but Faulkner's 64 off 29 has exposed it totally. For years, the mention of Ishant also had people thinking of that Perth spell to Ponting, I think his over to Faulkner is going to reach (dis)similarly legendary status.
Post-match presentation:
Anyone else feeling sorry for Dhoni. First a masterclass to save the side after most of the other batsmen muck it up, then to see the target chased down in this manner.
Poor Ishant is getting a barrage of unprintable mails. Even some calls for Agarkar to un-retire.
Doubly impressive from Faulkner as he was taken apart in the final over by Dhoni, he's turned it around with the bat though, and how?
Australia won by 4 wickets (with 3 balls remaining)
Player of the match is James Faulkner, AUS
